issue.title: Relation based on a list with cardinality 1..n doesn't work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

If I create a relation base on a list attribute with a cardinality 1..4, when I fill the list and I save, the form renders several relations filled with values. cf printscreen.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

solved in the 4.2.0
